products.title: iPhone 12
products.description: The iPhone 12 and iPhone 12 mini are Apple's mainstream flagship iPhones for 2020. The phones come in 6.1-inch and 5.4-inch sizes with identical features, including support for faster 5G cellular networks, OLED displays, improved cameras, and Apple's latest A14 chip, all in a completely refreshed design.

products.title: OnePlus 6T
products.description: The OnePlus 6T is an incremental hardware update to the prior OnePlus 6. Namely through increasing the size of the display along with the device's screen-to-body ratio by slightly shrinking the bottom chin bezel and using a taller, 19.5:9 AMOLED panel with more heavily curved corners & significantly smaller teardrop shaped notch. Update also includes increasing the size of the battery, removing the 3.5 mm audio jack, and providing a new optical in-display fingerprint sensor.

products.title: Huawei P40 Pro
products.description: Huawei P40 Pro smartphone runs on Android v10 (Q) operating system. The phone is powered by Octa core (2.86 GHz, Dual core, Cortex A76 + 2.36 GHz, Dual core, Cortex A76 + 1.95 GHz, Quad core, Cortex A55) processor. It runs on the HiSilicon Kirin 990 5G Chipset. It has 8 GB RAM and 256 GB internal storage.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy S20
products.description: Samsung Galaxy S20 smartphone runs on Android 10 operating system. The phone is powered by Octa core (2.73 GHz, Dual core, M5 Mongoose + 2.5 GHz, Dual core, Cortex A76 + 2 GHz, Quad core, Cortex A55) processor. It runs on the Samsung Exynos 9 Octa 990 Chipset. It has 8 GB RAM and 128 GB internal storage.

products.title: Xiaomi Mi11
products.description: The Xiaomi Mi 11 Smartphone offers with Qualcomm Snapdragon 888, 8GB / 12GB LPDDR5 RAM, 128 GB/ 256GB UFS 3.1 ROM, 4,600 mAh power cell that supports 55W wired fast-charging, 50W wireless, 6.81‚Äù AMOLED quad curved DotDisplay panel and WQHD+ 3200x1440 resolution display, as well as 108MP 8K main camera.

products.title: Alcatel OneTouch 2001
products.description: Alcatel One Touch 2001 is a perfect mobile device for people experiencing eyesight problems. Durable and simple design is available in 3 colors.
